description:
A (hopefully) not-so-bad client for virtueller-stundenplan.org

A (hopefully) not-so-bad client for "virtueller-stundenplan.org".

Features:

  • Week View: Displays the schedule for an entire week.
  • Day View: Displays the schedule for a single day.
  • Detail View: Shows details of individual lessons and allows setting aliases for subjects, teachers, and rooms.

Note: This app is only available in German.
